message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your perspective on the price, the value of this product is considerably higher. I'm willing to come down to $13,500.  This is my final offer.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,500. Can you consider that price?
